about_the_game:
Get ready for a unique VN experience! Packed with hilarious jokes set in a lively sorority and college setting, this game is like no other. Dive into scenarios straight out of classic films and take on the role of a fresh journalism student making waves at Cumlombia University.


In this demo, you'll get a tantalizing peek into the colorful characters that populate this world and the wild situations that you'll encounter in the full game. From choosing which path to take to experimenting with different choices, this game is designed to keep you engaged and on the edge of your seat. With each new playthrough, you'll have a chance to explore new paths and discover new outcomes, making the adventure even more thrilling and exciting.



"Pleasure Thieves - Special Edition" includes 4 Main Episodes:
- Episode 1: The New Boy
- Episode 2: Pompoms & Basketball
- Episode 3: Showtime!
- Episode 4: The Order
- Extra Content: Mrs. Evans & Her Daughter

content_descriptors.notes: Explicit depictions of sexual acts, full nudity.
